t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 6 hours ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Use Shop with Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon's Shop with Points program offers you the ability to use rewards points from participating credit card and loyalty programs for purchases at Amazon.com. You can use your reward points towards millions of items at Amazon.com checkout, including Kindle eBooks, Prime Video Purchases & Rentals, ...

t: Amazon Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Points can be used to pay for purchases made on the Amazon.co.jp website. Each Amazon Point is worth ¥1 when used to buy any item.
